content: many times as indicated weave in ends block as desired notes change to double pointed needles when stitches no care instructions hand wash or dry clean wash in tepid longer fit comfortably on circular needle water using a mild soap do not twist shape and dry flat on a towel store your little treasure neatly folded after all it may be a family heirloom hat with a and smaller circ ndl co 108 sts join to work in the round being careful not to twist sts pm to mark start of round rnds 1-10 *k1tbl pl repeat from * to end of round change to larger ndls next round k repeat last round until piece meas 3¼ from co rnds 1-4 with b k rnds 5-8 with c k p o box 88 minneapolis mn 55011 usa blueskyfibers com ©2020 this knit pattern is copyrighted material and under the copyright laws of the united states you may use this rnds 9-12 with d k pattern for your own personal use or enjoyment but may not edit publish copy or commercially exploit this pattern in any way 10012020
